name: Run, Riley. (Demo)
description:
Riley has gone down this road before, but always turned back. The daily grind seems inescapable, until Riley discovers that the way out is by exposing the truth–revealing the harsh moments they’ve survived and the trauma that’s been left behind. Help Riley face the past and uncover a new future.


A game demo made for the Narrative Driven Jam #6.

Team effort by
Sky (Art)
https://skybluesiha.itch.io

Seimei (Music)
https://seimeinonagare.itch.io

Nine (Narrative)

Zippo (Coding)
https://lordzippo.itch.io/
